description:
Taxed heavy fuel oil

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73431 Energy tax statistics

Definition:
Heavy fuel oil is a product subject to excise duties, in
this case energy tax.
Heavy fuel oil refers to fuel oils of subheadings 2710 19 61
to 2710 19 69 of the Combined Nomenclature.

name: Taxed heavy fuel oil
